author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Recently it appears that Youtube has made a hidden change to how metrics are calculated, even though views are way down, revenue hasn't changed at all and the view to like ratio is through the roof and Youtube won't explain what is happening.
